text: Mesoponera melanaria, is a species of ant of the subfamily Ponerinae. 2 subspecies recognized. ==Subspecies== * Mesoponera melanaria macra Emery, 1894 \- Seychelles * Mesoponera melanaria melanaria(Emery, 1893) \- Seychelles, India, Sri Lanka, China ==References== *Animaldiversity.org *Itis.org ==External links== * * at antwiki.org Category:Ponerinae Category:Hymenoptera of Asia Category:Insects described in 1893
title: Mesoponera melanaria
